website_summaries.verdict: A nourishing hair color that's made with hair-loving ingredients and comes with 2 additional conditioners to keep hair looking and feeling its best.
pros: Made with a trio of plant-based oils – shea, avocado, and olive –  that nourish and make hair soft and shiny
Comes with a packet of grapeseed fruit oil and a bottle of conditioner for extra moisturizing effects
Easy to apply, thanks to the drip-free formula
cons: Some colors turn out either lighter or darker than expected
Some consumers say the color fades fairly quickly, especially on gray hair

customer_reviews.title: Using #92 Buttery Blonde, like it better than redken color gels!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Garnier Fructis blonde hair dye for close to a decade now. I recently tried to use The redken color gels+shades eq and it was ok, but I definitely prefer the tones that garnier gives me! So thank you! In the picture I used #92 the buttery blonde and for reference my natural hair is probably a 4 (medium brown). Hope that helps!
customer_reviews.author: Fabyglam

customer_reviews.title: Please don’t ever stop making this color!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got dark blonde hair and like my hair to be a lighter blonde. For years, I went to the salon for color but after having the kids, I couldn’t afford to go for time and money reasons. I was super hesitant about using at home color because I’ve had some BAD experiences that made me have to get an emergency, expensive color correction just to be able to go back in public. I researched like crazy to find an at home blonde color and have been using this color, Garnier White Chocolate 111 for years now. So happy I’m able to do my color at home!
customer_reviews.author: Fit Dad

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: Fades fairly quickly, but beautifully. Hair was bleached beforehand. Will probably purchase again. Doesn't transer too much after 2-3 washes. Was prettty purple when initially dyed, faded to pink, then rose gold, then to a light gold with a rose tone.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Darker than the picture
customer_reviews.text: My color was nothing like the picture. It came out very dark brown, almost black. Had to strip it and start over
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color did not take in my hair at all 😢 ...
customer_reviews.text: Color did not take in my hair at all 😢. Granted my hair is a dark but it did not lighten at all. Might work on other hair but didn’t on mine
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Color waaaaaaay off
customer_reviews.text: I used this to dye my very expensive real human hair extensions. I've dyed them before and never had an issue, so I KNOW they can handle dye. They were super light blonde to begin with and I wanted to darken them a little to match my "winter hair" (blondes, you know what I mean!) The color (medium blonde #80) turned out almost greyish silver, not at all what I wanted. If I had dyed my own hair with this color, I would've been mortified.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer78

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this out on my hair, because the reviews were so good. It did lighten my hair, just not as much as I expected. I started with light brown/dark blonde and it's now a medium blonde. My hair is a little dry, but not bad. This was my first time using a permanent hair dye. I was a little nervous, but I think it turned out OK. Here are some before and after photos.
customer_reviews.author: Swordfightsandteaparties

customer_reviews.title: Hair turned out great. Slightly brassy at the roots but I used ...
customer_reviews.text: Hair turned out great. Slightly brassy at the roots but I used John Frieda purple shampoo and I think it helped. I haven’t colored my hair for 30 years. It’s been colored and highlighted professionally for a very long time. I decided to take the risk and color it myself to save money and because I’m tired of spending hours in a salon chair. I’ve calculated I can save about $700 or more by coloring myself. I’m so excited!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Daken

customer_reviews.title: The best affordable hair coloring out there
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my mom that lives in Colombia, she has dyed her hair for about 25 years and she says this is the best hair coloring she has ever had. Every time she comes she buys like 20 boxes. She is absolutely in love with this product. And I can see it too! Beautiful color, is durable, doesn’t change over time and her hair is actually very very soft!!! An extra plus: very affordable!
customer_reviews.author: DCCM

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this hair color.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this hair color. This is already my second order from this seller and I made a subscription to it every three weeks. Like many blondes, I was faced with the fact that a week or a half after dyeing the hair, the blond acquires a not pleasant yellowish tint. I changed a very large number of colors, tried the anti-yellow shampoo and still the hair turned yellow. Having painted this paint two weeks ago, I did not expect something unexpected, but about a miracle, the third week after painting and no yellow tint is coming !!! I am very very happy. I also want to note the pleasant smell of the coloring composition itself.
customer_reviews.author: Siarhei

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware: This product is OLD and past the due date and ruined my hair... doesn't cover grey!
customer_reviews.text: PS: My thick hair has become thin, brittle and corse due to this product and now I need professionall conditioning treatments from my hairdresser! IT'S OLD! DON'T USE THIS PRODUCT! This didn't cover my grey at all; formula 2 cream was hard coming out of tube and there is no expiration date on box! Became ill after using it...and this has never happened after my monthly visits to hairdresser for color! Buyer beware!! Post Script: After reviewing this I went to the Garnier site to find the expiration date ...and it was expired when sent to me...don't trust Amazon products!!!
customer_reviews.author: Touch Down

customer_reviews.title: Fades with every wash but it's a gorgeous color!
customer_reviews.text: The pix is 23 days after dying (or reapplication of the same color). I LOVE the color, only complaint is that it fades with every wash. I wouldn't call this "black cherry", as it's listed. Much more violet than red, but I knew that from past experience, that's exactly why this is the 3rd time I've purchased this and will continue to do so!
customer_reviews.author: ✿ Brandy Alexandria ✿

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it in the store
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered the same color I’ve been using for almost a decade now, mainly because the stores around us have been slow to restock. I should’ve realized something was off as soon as I mixed everything. And by mix, I mean everything stayed separated even after 2 people shook the hell out of it. But I went with it, did the whole application process and it is NOT the correct color. Where 2 entire bottles USUALLY gives me complete coverage, this left my hair with a dull, dark color and barely masked my roots. I’d rather look like I just haven’t had the time to re-color rather than buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much same experience as everyone else
customer_reviews.text: Well the box arrived in a bubble pack but inside that the box with all the stuff to dye my hair was open. Like everyone else said the color was darker than expected. But it’s still a brown and for now my grays are covered, hopefully that won’t change. I’d like maybe a shade lighter with a more golden tone but maybe next time.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: When you are Celt and Norse...
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product that can hide my red!
customer_reviews.author: Ameliana

customer_reviews.title: Super subtle!
customer_reviews.text: I used this dye over faded, processed red hair and was worried it would turn purple. Once the dye develops on your head, it looks blue... VERY BLUE. Don't freak out! I was amazed at how well it took to my hair. It is a very intense black with an extremely subtle hint of blue you can only make out in the sunlight. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtnee amos

customer_reviews.title: Lightened my medium brown roots beautifully
customer_reviews.text: My roots and grey hairs had grown out quite a bit and I needed to both cover grey and lighten them a few shades. This worked great to lighten my hair a few shades. It does not have great grey coverage but because my hair is so light now the greys are harder to notice. All in all for a box dye this was a great experience.
customer_reviews.author: JennyMae

customer_reviews.title: Product does not hold to hair.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this product for years. Same color. I bought a three pack and one came crushed. I contacted the seller and they immediately replaced all three. They were very helpful BUT I think there’s something wrong with the product. I’m not sure if it’s old or counterfeit (looks very legit) but the color does not hold to my hair for very long. The included conditioner also does not smell like the store bought. I won’t be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Deezeey

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the salon!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! Bought this in medium brown and it covered all the gray hair with no trouble at all. Directions say leave in for 25 mins but since my hair was so bad I left it in for an additional 15. Bought another box for next months root touch up
customer_reviews.author: Brigid

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, but NOT for people looking to cover greys!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this last night. Never colored my own hair before and was quite nervous. It couldn’t have been simpler. However, it didn’t cover my grey- maybe a couple, but definitely not for folks who have a good amount of grey hair. I left it on for 30 minutes as instructed and have the majority of the grey hair I started with remaining. Also the smell during is perfectly pleasant- but the smell when you are finished is ehhh. However, my hair is baby soft now. Which is surprising since I have very dry and dehydrated hair- so at least there’s that.
customer_reviews.author: CJacobs

customer_reviews.title: Waaaaay darker than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: My hair was light reddish brown before. I bought 2 boxes and it wasn't enough to cover all my hair so I had to dilute it with conditioner. Even after heavily diluting it, my hair turned out near black. If I wouldn't have diluted it then my hair would for sure look black. So picture my hair a shade darker than it is in the pic and that's the color of this dye! Otherwise great product. Lasted super long and didn't smell horrible.
customer_reviews.author: August R.

customer_reviews.title: #50 Truffle Covered my grays
customer_reviews.text: Since my grays were showing due to Covid quarantine, I decided to try box color. I used #50 Truffle, Medium Natural Brown. I have medium dark brown hair that I usually professionally color. I first bought #41 Iced Coffee, Dark Nude Brown because my hair tends to pull red with any warm tones. The strand test was way too dark, almost black. So I went back to the Garnier online quiz and chose again. This was very easy to use, didn’t smell bad (my daughter said it smelled sweet—probably the fruit oil you add), and covered my grays. I’d use it again if the salons don’t open soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: decent.
customer_reviews.text: Used 513. Before and after pics. Looks pretty much the same, but had a bunch of blonde on the bottom half and wanted to get rid of it. Will use a darker color next time. Pretty good though. ALSO no hair fell out. I used L’Oréal last time and sooooo much of my hair fell out, I didn’t dye my hair for almost 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Weak in color payoff.... disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a light auburn hair color but this was really weak in color pay off. Instead of making my hair look anything like the color of the pictures, it hardly did any noticable color change at all. Very disappointed in this. The plus side was that it made my hair soft, but that was almost about what it did. I accept that my hair is dark brown to light brown with highlights and I did bleach my hair before, but I should at least see some changes in my bleach hair! Not much at all! Very disappointed in this product. I won't be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: MadHatter

customer_reviews.title: Garnier Nutrisse  Hair Color Is an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Garnier Nutrisse Nourishing Hair Color Creme, Left my hair soft, shine band a beautiful medium brown with natural highlights. This is the first time I colored my own hair and no one knows I didn't go to a salon. This product saved me over $80 and gave me better results than having my hair done by a "professional ". Wish I discovered this a long time ago !
customer_reviews.author: Isi

customer_reviews.title: Never ordering again
customer_reviews.text: 0 stars here. I do not know if the item was too old or something but the developer bottle was cracked which i didn't see until i added the dye and oil and everything just spilled out. Will not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Sahara16

customer_reviews.title: Your experience could be different...
customer_reviews.text: I use sweet cola, I have naturally medium to dark hair. My greys come in as single strands vs full root, so yes this mutes their platinum shine, but does not fully eliminate the grey. Smell is not completely offensive on the dark colors (can’t say for the lighter ones) I use this about every 6-8 weeks, and for the $10 and less than 45 minutes that it takes me I’m satisfied with the results. I use my own gloves because this comes with the lunch lady style. Does not look “store bought” in sunlight, and I ALWAYS get compliments on my hair in general.
customer_reviews.author: S313

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color because it’s the closest I could find to my natural color. I love how the scent is fruity and not just all chemical smell. Although in a closed room it gets pretty strong still. I love that it comes with the oil for that boost and shine along with conditioner in the shower for one application. I do wish it would last longer though!! I get about 3 weeks in before I cants stand seeing grays again. But I always feel like it’s too soon to dye my hair yet again!
customer_reviews.author: Marya Mann

customer_reviews.title: Used to be easy to leave packaging review
customer_reviews.text: Amazon, please fix this issue of leaving reviews. There used to be a button that left reviews for packaging. Which by the way was AWFUL on this product. If you know the product is sensitive like a HAIR DYE, please make sure to protect it properly so it arrives in tact. My hair dye came completely destroyed and it was because it had no protection what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Very terrible smell- stings your eyes
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst hair coloring product I've tried so far. The strong smell made my eyes tear throughout the process. Also, the amount of product is insufficient for long hair. My hair is up to my chest- but I needed two full bottles of product to fully cover my hair. I ordered the 2 count hoping to use it on 2 separate coloring sessions - but ended up having to use both in one session. The outcome is mediocre. Color isn't as bright. Dries the hair.
customer_reviews.author: li

customer_reviews.title: Great hair color and product
customer_reviews.text: The color is rich and lasts very well for red. The price is great and my hair looks and feels healthy and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: WP

customer_reviews.title: Love this color!
customer_reviews.text: This color is so hard to find in stores. It sells out fast (if they have it at all). I've been using this color for years and continue to get many complements. It's dark and shiny with red tones when the light hits it. It doesn't look like it comes from a box! Can't beat the Amazon price and it's so convenient. I have it on my monthly subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: BP21

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and no harsh chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I'm fair skinned and prone to chemical burns. This product was nice and gentle. The coloring was nice and even and the price is amazing. Men or women, this is a great product. For the record, my hair is thin and short.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCrazy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit the color is darker but I love it. I definitely will be buying this color again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C

customer_reviews.title: It's all I will use ever again!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful dye. Your hair will come out as indicated on the box unlike so many other dyes. It doesn't seem to damage hair AT ALL because of the argon and other oils in it. My hair felt better after I dyed it than before I did! I will continue to use this for root touch ups because the color does not fade! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Looks natural, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the 50 medium natural brown (truffle) for a few years. I love it. It looks very natural, it is easy to use and covers the greys that I have. It looks better than when I have had it done professionally because they always color it too dark and it doesn’t look natural.
customer_reviews.author: Shawny

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT HAIR PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this product for years to lighten my hair. It does a great job and leaves my hair in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: G Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great hair dye if you like brown hair!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is light brown mostly and was even lighter at the tips but my whole hair went dark auburn. Nothing like the hair colour pictured even though my hair was the recommended hair colour to start to get optimal results. Don’t get me wrong, it’s not AWFUL looking by any means but it’s not the coppery red I ordered :(
customer_reviews.author: Liz Dowding

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the color on the box
customer_reviews.text: My hair was magenta red but after this dye it looks like a really dark red barely visible unless in the sun. Doesnt look anything like the dye on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: Like most reviews here. This product came out very dark. I have a lot of gray that I need to cover. Hair isn't too long. But I did buy two boxes. I applied both boxes at once. Now that the hair has faded. I have a beautiful color. I am very pleased. Just be aware that you will look like you have black hair for the first couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Neutral, not  yellow
customer_reviews.text: A comment on 92 "Light Buttery Blonde": This is a very nice, neutral light blonde, not at all "buttery" or yellow, as you might expect from the product title.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bass

customer_reviews.title: Was not same color in the box !!
customer_reviews.text: Please be careful I bought the blond one like 2 months ago and was perfect then I bought the burgundy one I made sure I was the same as I have done it last time and the burgundy came out black in my hair an I got the light burgundy I do my hair all the time I didn't do nothing wrong now my hair is black which I really don't like and have to wait to go to a salon to have it stripped really should make sure they send the right color in the boxes really upset !
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I had this product on my hair for 35 minutes and it did not change not one color on my head except for the roots
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! But ....
customer_reviews.text: I use the shade Light Natural Blonde. It’s so natural on me and when I try other shades I keep coming back to this one. Update: I still use this color but it does fade very fast, my roots look darker golden blonde and my ends look bleached. Very uneven fade. But it’s the only one that suits me so far, sadly.
customer_reviews.author: DEC

customer_reviews.title: Bad for grey coverage
customer_reviews.text: I bought #50 medium natural brown and used it on dark brown hair with some grey. I left it on for like seven mins longer than regular (they say to leave on five mins longer for gray) and it came out pretty bad. It was too reddish in general, and the grey strands didn’t match the rest of the hair they were lighter. After less than a week some grays are now almost completely grey again, with all the dye being washed off even though I didn’t see any bleeding of dye in the shower. I think this is just not a good dye for greys (#50) so I would not recommend it for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: C. Eres

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend or buy again
customer_reviews.text: PROS: I love this color. I was excited to try this brand. It was very easy to use and didn't drip everywhere. The color came out as expected and decently covered greys. The odor wasn't horrible and conditioner was just ok. CONS: It has been TWO weeks and SEVEN washes later, and the hair color is STILL coming out with every single wash! It's not just a little either, it's A LOT! I'm afraid to even go out when it's raining without an umbrella for fear it will stain my clothes. I will never buy this brand again for that reason. I've never had this issue with other permanent hair color brands.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney B.

customer_reviews.title: I keep reordering it
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for many years and I still love it. I am back to order more. People can not tell, that I color my hair, they think its my natural color, I find it hilarious.
customer_reviews.author: rima b.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this cuz my hair was light mixed brown with natural red/ light brown and dark brown on the bottom. I want all one color and this Dry did.. I freaking love it.. I put a before and after pictures. The after is the all dark brown and the before itls the light color
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: No way!
customer_reviews.text: This product was not good for me! Used it and it dyed half of my hair a different color and my scalp turned extremely blond! I've used at-home hair dyes before and they never have turned out this way!
customer_reviews.author: Ciara Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I got a bad box
customer_reviews.text: Turned my copper hair brown. Very disappointed. I've used this company in the past and have always been pleased with my results. This turned my light colored hair very dark with little-to-no hints of red. Hoping this was a bad box...
customer_reviews.author: Spotlight Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking color for brunette
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite hair color line. I usually only do my roots. What I don't like about it though is that they changed the packaging for the oil additive about 2 years ago and you have to use a scissors to open it as it won't just snap off. I know as I color my roots several times a month. I have very long hair and this does not seem to dry it out. However I don't blow dry or curl my hair with a hot iron.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Good color and easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I usually go every 4 weeks to have my hair colored and I have hilites every 3 months. The light ash brown covered my roots very well, it is an even color and my hilites are still there. There was no odor and y hair feels soft. Maybe I will use it after the quarantine and save money!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hair dye that doesn’t dry out hair
customer_reviews.text: This hair dye is incredible. It took me an hour to dye my blonde hair brown, and it’s been three months and it’s still holding strong. If anything after I dyed my hair brown my hair felt softer and stronger. It didn’t dry my hair out at all. (Because it comes with a moisturizing serum you mix in with the dye). The only problem I have with this is the developer it comes with smells like ammonia, so it really knocked the breath out of me many times. Other than that I will continue to use this hair dye in the future, especially because the price is so damn affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Amber R. Amlie

customer_reviews.title: Good color
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy as paying someone to do it but we can't do that now, can we? End result is great. I've been using this brand for years. Wear a dark shirt that you don't mind getting dirty!
customer_reviews.author: J. Mastrolia

customer_reviews.title: Fixed an expensive dye job
customer_reviews.text: A very expensive salon botched my hair and fried it. I was overdone in blond highlights. Garniers Nutriesse in Medium Brown saved me. I was nervous to do box color but didn't want to go back to a salon for hours.... I am so glad I did. I think I'm going to be a box color girl from now on instead of dropping $$$$ at the salon!
customer_reviews.author: Shireen Hormozdi

customer_reviews.title: As expected...thank goodness!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't do review stars for scent or longevity because reds always fade easy and hair dye always smells awful so there was no point in docking stars for that, lol, but this product deserves a 5 star review because it arrived in a timely manner, was not damaged, worked just like an identical one I purchased at the store, and was bought at a good price. That was all a big relief because I've received several products from other Amazon sellers lately that weren't worth the time or money spent on ordering them. This product was worth it and I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: April Ilana

customer_reviews.title: Great color, easy to apply, lasts
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Garnier Nutrisse for a while. I sadly started greying in my early 20s, and I'm at about 15% grey now probably. I just started to use this color (613) and I really like it! My goal has always been to just get the color as close to my natural color as possible, and the other ones I've tried have always made it a bit too red. This one is certainly more natural and doesn't change the undertones as much. Overall, I really like it and I get complimented on my hair color quite often.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Won't be using this brand anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Just got regular black dye; nothing special. Looked good for about a month but.... I can see the brown again (and not the roots). I haven't dyed my hair in a couple of years but it seems like something has happened to the formulas in the past 10 years because this isn't as permanent as it once was. I will never be using this brand again for dye, which is a shame because it used to be my go-to. Sadly, had better results from Dollar Tree's hair dye when it comes to longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: better than other brands
customer_reviews.text: I love Garnier. I've used a couple other brands. I assume that it's the oil in this brand that makes a difference, but my hair is softer and doesn't have that straw-like feeling that some brands have. Color is nice and has some depth to it. My hair person recommended this.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Colors hair perfectly, damage free!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this shade for about 2 years. It's very easy to use and doesn't require any bleaching on my naturally sandy brown hair. I do a root touch up every 6 weeks. I have never experienced any damage using this product and hair feels soft and full after each use. Use of this product on naturally brunette hair is not recommended without prior bleaching and toning.
customer_reviews.author: Marika Labash

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hair color
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time using this box hair color. I usually get my hair done professionally, but with the COVID19 scare and closure of many un-essential businesses, I had no choice. I am very happy with the results and it covered all of the gray hair that I had on my roots. The color covered all my gray and looks great! I may not go to a hair salon anymore. This was very easy to apply and my hair looks so good and healthy. Way cheaper too. I would recommend others to purchase this hair product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Camarena

customer_reviews.title: Good conditioning
customer_reviews.text: Works like the same home hair care as many have been for years nothing really new except the conditioning oil and conditioner did make texture better after final wash. It wasn't the color I wanted exactly because my hair is very long and theols grow took more color even though I did my roots first. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Faded quickly
customer_reviews.text: I used the Darkest Brown color in April. By the end of May, most of the color had started to fade. And by June even more. Its too bad because it was very easy to apply and the packaging with all of the separate contents made for simple work. But the proof is in the pudding....and this pudding was a waste of money, I wish there was some way to get a refund or a partial credit edven for a product that did not work for me despite the marketing and the testimonials.
customer_reviews.author: Porgy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hair coloring
customer_reviews.text: I have a odd color hair (natural). I am so tired of spending lots of money on hairdressers who don't come close ....I have areas of gray in the front and by my temple/ear area. This covers perfectly,is the best match for my natural color and doesn't make my hair dry or burned...this has become my go to brand....I have tried many and poor results when done professionally...I can spend that money on something else !!! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Micki

customer_reviews.title: Works great for retouching my gray roots and is super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for my grey roots for 2 years and love it. It’s so easy to use and as far as dyes go it doesn’t have the worst smell. Pretty gentle on my scalp and doesn’t burn like when you go to the salon many times. I do find I have to leave it on for longer than what it says just to make sure it really takes. Also I tried one of the blond ones of the same color line on my moms roots and that didn’t work as well but this shade does a great job for me.
customer_reviews.author: shalom Lombo

customer_reviews.title: Black not Berry
customer_reviews.text: This color is not as pictured on the box. It turned my hair almost black. I used a similar Garnier color before and it came out great, but this one is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Invader Zee

customer_reviews.title: My hair has never felt so soft!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used color treatment at home many times before but this is my first time trying "Nutrisse". I was very pleasantly surprised with the product and the outcome. The color looks great and very natural. Besides the color looking great, my hair has never felt so silky and smooth following a color treatment. I'm not sure if it's the after color conditioner or the oil that is added to the color but it left my hair feeling amazing instead of stripped which many do. I'll definitely use Nutrisse again.
customer_reviews.author: Liesel Waters

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Totally waste of money, use 2 hours to paint the hair but comes out nothing
customer_reviews.author: Dell

customer_reviews.title: Great color make sure though if you want dark to ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy these for me so i'm making a review off my girl friends hair....do not get these mixed up if your looking for dark....they do have different color codes to tell for sure! if your buying these for some one special ask them first please... Great color make sure though if you want dark to get the dark one is redish brown wich is what my gf all ready is...nice colors though thanks...last a while...
customer_reviews.author: Gomez R.

customer_reviews.title: True to color
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use, did not spell horrendous, and the color came out pretty much exactly as I imagined it would. My hair is light red but with the dye, my hair turned out a pretty champagne tone of blond. Feels very soft. Even took to gray roots well.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R. Day

customer_reviews.title: Nice neutral light brown tone.
customer_reviews.text: This color is great for dark brunettes who'd like to go a little lighter and cover grey hair. There is warmth but no brassiness. I did try a different Garnier neutral/nude shade lighter --- didn't like the results, so I've come back to this color.
customer_reviews.author: Mel N

customer_reviews.title: I love my black hair!
customer_reviews.text: Base on what I've read from others, I just wanted to remind people to be mindful that everyone's hair reacts differently to hair dyes. I bought two boxes thinking that I'd need it (base on past experience) but now that I have short hair ( + it's thin ) one box sufficed! You have the option to use your hands to put on the dye (especially since gloves are provided) but I would personally recommend using a brush. I would also recommend buying a dye friendly shampoo to secure the longevity of the hair color!
customer_reviews.author: Tania Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Garnier Nutress is Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hair color our favorite brand and it comes in a two pack, excellent value we have it on auto ship. Highly recommend to family and friends and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Nice color but fades a bit too quick
customer_reviews.text: Great color but do NOT exceed time or it will be crazy darker. I have like light auburn strawberry blonde natural color. I have been ordering this color for a year now. After about 2 months it fades back to almost my natural color and i do it all again.. If you want to maintain color i would say do it monthly. I only can wah my hair 2 times a week because it's so thin and the texture..
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: Very good color for the value! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to cover up some grey i have. I have dark brown hair and wanted a color that wouldn’t strip my hair so I figured this was a good choice. I love it! It does take to the grey so I have a nice red purple tint to my hair with bright highlights where my grey was coming in. I plan on using this color again. The smell isn’t bad just the typical potent hair dye smell but I’m used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Strawberry Jam
customer_reviews.text: Since the Quarantine I been wanting to try to color my hair myself. Especially since my roots were growing in. I have dark brown hair and been doing subtle red/auburn type color. This color matched what my hairstylist been doing on me. So I’m extremely pleased at this outcome. This is only day 1. So we’ll see how long this lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shade for blondes
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use! This color works best if you are a natural blonde just trying to lighten a little or brighten up your hair. If you have brown hair do not expect to become blonde. I have naturally medium blonde hair. This shade makes my hair very light and it looks very natural and not harsh. It’s very easy to use just one application for 30 minutes and then condition.
customer_reviews.author: Allyn

customer_reviews.title: Fixed a bad dye job
customer_reviews.text: I had recently bleached my hair and went over it with another brand of dye that was supposed to be dark brown, but turned my hair into a copper color. I put this over the top of it, and it came out beautifully. I now have my natural hair color back!!
customer_reviews.author: Heaven

customer_reviews.title: Faded out fast!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this to dye my light brown (slightly bleached) hair back to black. It looked great at first, but after about a month, the dye had been almost washed out and I could see my light brown hair again (keep in mind, I wash my hair every other day). I'm really surprised because this is the first time a hair dye has faded out this fast for me.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Orange Roots
customer_reviews.text: While I was pleased that the product didn't turn my hair black, it also didn't get my roots dark enough and left them looking very orange. I had to purchase another hair color for my roots. Maybe if left on longer than the instructions say the roots would have been colored enough, but following the instructions didn't yield good results. The conditioner is nice but seems smaller than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Masked Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just didn’t cover and stay on grays... washed out quite quickly. I only tried this product as my previous product was discontinued. Now I am on the hunt again for a color that will cover gray on blonde hair, last and not be brassy.
customer_reviews.author: Tizzy

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy this product.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this brand several times and have never had any problems with it. The color took about a day to really show up. Nice hint of color. Will be nice in the sun. :) This always leaves my hair very shiny, and I really like that it doesn't leave my hair feeling 'rubbery' afterwards like some other brands. Smell has always been pretty strong and long lasting, wish something could be done about that. Not a big deal though. I bought 2 because I have a lot of long curly hair. One of the tubes was broken or not sealed correctly on the bottom and some leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I have found this to be easiest to apply and longest lasting. I have medium length hair. When my hair gets longer, I wish there was more as the bottle holds just enough for medium length hair. The plastic gloves it comes with are very large and cheap. The conditioner it comes with is excellent. Follow the directions for timing!
customer_reviews.author: Denisey

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Store always seems to be OUT of the product #. Amazon had it and it was here within days. Great product. I always use this Garnier Nutrisse hair color. Easy to use. More perfect than having it done at a salon and wayyyy less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Donna Donna

customer_reviews.title: Blueberry Jam 32/Intense Berry Black
customer_reviews.text: This did not leave any color in my daughter's hair. She wanted to do the bottom half of her hair (she has medium brown hair). After following the directions (even left in on an extra 10 minutes), there is absolutely NO DIFFERENCE in color of the top and bottom half of her hair. Truly disappointed as my older two girls have used Nutrisse colors on several occasions.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfThree

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Product smelt great and did exactly what I wanted it to. I have medium brown hair at the roots, which are longer then ever since quarantine and it’s grown out with a couple grays. The end of my hair is bleached and has a vivid blue color on it. I used the blueberry jam color color to dye my roots almost black and faded it into my blue ends to get a beautiful color. If I would have got this color done at a salon easily would have cost me $150-$300 but this box and my mom only cost me some fresh flowers and $7
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Glad I tried this
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about coloring my hair, it's very fragile. I heard positive things about this product, so with much hesitation I gave it a shot. I followed the instructions precisely, and was very pleased. The color is pretty much exactly what I expected. My hair went undamaged, and the conditioner left it very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Shino

customer_reviews.title: Great color, easy application, good after results
customer_reviews.text: Love the resulting color- from medium brown to a dark cherry chocolate. Very pleased with the results, am going to buy again in 4 weeks. :-) It’s an easy to use product, I kept it on 10 min over the 25 and think that’s why it’s darker red then expected. I’ve colored my hair for years and you expect a bit of drying/change in hair texture, with this product it’s minimal (at least the first time). Solid choice for home dye.
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: I love how it makes my hair after using it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for over 12 years now, I love how it makes my hair after using it. The color is absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow, this is darker than the picture
customer_reviews.text: My natural color is about the color on the box. My hair has lightened where I used a "temporary" color on it and my roots were darker so I was trying to get an even color. My hair is now a medium red brown, much darker than advertised. What a surprise. Grey was covered. I ran out of coloring product about 3/4 through and my hair is about 5" past my shoulders, so I had to really work it in and it was not saturated. Color still took.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi CA

customer_reviews.title: sweet cola
customer_reviews.text: i got the darkest brown (sweet cola) it definitely turned my hair black. which is not what i wanted so i’m upset and hoping it’ll fade after a few washes. the dye itself looked blue so maybe i got a messed up box with the wrong color.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the this hair doesn't work well. I have dark brown hair. My hair never looked blue black just deep black. After 3 washes I still smelled the dye in my hair, my hair started falling out, and the dye kept being washed away. Lucky I purchased an amazing cold pressed Castrol oil and I got my hair back. But I would not recommend to this to anyone. My hair is now dark brown again. After 6 weeks of applying.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: might work if you have perfectly virgin hair but i’d say give it an upgrade and go for some professional color. i thought it would do enough of what i want, but now my hair is like 3 colors and... not cute. box dye is not it :/
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle

customer_reviews.title: Garnier Nutrisse Nourished Permanant
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use I need to boxes and so worth the price I just add a few packets of stuff that I bought because I have course Grey hair I only wash my hair 2 to 3 times a week but I bath everyday
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L.

customer_reviews.title: The Darkest
customer_reviews.text: The color was darker than shown on screen but the returns process was very easy. It was easy to print a label and just place the item in a UPS box. No need to go to the post office. Credit was issued back to my account immediately. Though the color did not work for me, Amazon made the returns process seamless and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Marz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this dye. Usually I don't buy box dye but my Sally's near me closed so I decided to try this and I love it. I decided to get a subscription of it lol. It works great. Smell is a bit strong but I live in an apartment with no windows in the bathroom. It feels almost like conditioner which is good making it easier to run through my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen S.

customer_reviews.title: Hair Dye
customer_reviews.text: The color of this product is great. It came out really well. The packaging is super cute and it is easy to mix the creams and put it on my hair. The only down side is the smell. It was so strong and I had a window open and it still smelled really strong. The color came out really well and it has lasted a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Katz

customer_reviews.title: Worked good
customer_reviews.text: I used to this to bleach my hair, works good.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Great Color, No Mess
customer_reviews.text: Great color quality. Results are soft and bright. I tend to end up with color on my hands and skin as I'm not always diligent to prevent. Although still take precautions, no residual color on my hands or face with this dye. Of course using gloves, but I tend to do this quickly and found this greatly accommodating to a rushed person. Chemical smell seems less with this too, still strong as colors are, but didn't seem as bad as others to me. Color showed exactly as promised on my hair even with (eh-em) gray coverage. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Best blond in a head of hair with alot of natural red.
customer_reviews.text: Still some red with the color ... but better than the loreal and even the separate developer and toner at sally's
customer_reviews.author: A Gupta

product_meta.title: Garnier Nutrisse Nourishing Hair Color Creme, 50 Medium Natural Brown (Truffle) (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Count| Color:50Garnier Nutrisse is the only permanent hair color creme that nourishes while you color with avocado, olive, and shea oils. The nourishing color creme enriched with fruit oil concentrate, penetrates deep into hair fibers to nourish and condition your hair so it takes color better and holds it longer, root-to-tip. Garnier Nutrisse delivers rich, radiant, long-lasting hair color with 100% grey coverage. • Permanent, nourishing hair color creme with three fruit oils- avocado, olive, and shea • The only hair color creme with a separate ampoule of grape seed oil to start nourishing as you color • Rich, radiant, long-lasting color with 100 percent grey coverage • Available in 45 Nourishing Shades Always read the hair color instructions insert in the box. Store between 50° and 80° F. Questions? Garnier Nutrisse has expert color consultants to help you. Call: 1-800-4GARNIER (1-800-442-7643). IMPORTANT: Hair color can cause an allergic reaction. Do not use if you’ve already had a reaction to a hair color product or if scalp is sensitive, itchy or damaged. Tattoos may increase risk of an allergic reaction. Do skin allergy test 48 hours before each use of this product. Don’t use over compound henna or progressive color. Wait at least 14 days after bleach, relaxing or perm before use. Don’t use on children. This is a safety summary. Read all labeling and instructions completely.

BRAND STORY
By Garnier Nutrisse

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Having trouble finding the right shade? Questions on how to apply your Nutrisse Hair Color product? Ask a Garnier Hair Color Expert.


If you have a question about a Nutrisse Hair Color product, talk to one of our Customer Care representatives.


Phone: 1-877-297-5043

Monday-Friday, 9:00 AM-5:30PM ET



See more
feature_bullets: NOURISHING HAIR COLOR: Discover the #1 Nourishing Color Creme. Nutrisse Color is formulated with color boost technology & a blend of triple fruit oils--avocado, olive & shea--to deliver permanent hair color, even to dark hair.
PERMANENT HAIR DYE: Garnier Nutrisse hair color creme, with grape seed and avocado oil, comes in a complete hair dye kit and nourishes while it colors with a rich, non drip creme formula.
GARNIER HAIR COLOR: For nourishing, easy-to-use permanent hair dye, temporary hair color, root touch up, or to enhance your natural hair color, turn to Garnier hair color.

OVER 100 YEARS OF PIONEERING IN HAIR CARE: Since 1904 Garnier has blended naturally inspired & derived ingredients into breakthrough formulas. Nourish your hair with hair color & hair care from Garnier.
GARNIER IS INCOMPARABLE: Try Express Retouch Gray Hair Concealer for a temporary hair color solution to cover gray hair in between uses of your favorite Garnier Hair Dye shade.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
